Uses of Package
oaidtb.boosters.costSensitive

Packages that use oaidtb.boosters.costSensitive
oaidtb.boosters.costSensitive   
 

Classes in oaidtb.boosters.costSensitive used by oaidtb.boosters.costSensitive
AbstractCSB
          Abstract class for the cost sensitive boosters.
AbstractCSB.CombinedPredictionModel
          Interface for the internal classes that will serve to configure how the base classifiers will be combined to obtain the final hypothesis for a given instance.
AdaCost
          An implementation of AdaCost; for more information, see: Fan, Stolfo, Zhang & Chan, AdaCost: Misclassification cost-sensitive boosting..
AdaCostB1
          One of the small changes proposed for AdaCost in: Ting, K.M., A Comparative Study of Cost-Sensitive Boosting Algorithms..
